name: InnerBlood
description:
This is a game, about killing slimes, with your own blood. You sacrifice your own blood to kill slimes and get as much kills as possible.

So don’t try to attack too much, or you will lose all your blood and eventually die.

While you’re losing blood while trying to kill slimes, you can drink some blood from the bloodbags that randomly spawn in random spots. To regain some health.

Controls

  • WASD or (Arrow keys) to move
  • Left mouse button to attack towards the direction of the mouse position
